content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Max. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. I believe that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement on the rental price. Can you please provide me with your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. So I am open to any price that is reasonable. However, I would like to know if there are any other conditions that I need to be aware of, such as the lease term or any additional fees.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I see. Well, I am willing to be flexible on the rental price as well, Max. However, there are a few conditions that I would like to clarify before we come to an agreement. Firstly, the lease term would be for one year, with the possibility of renewal for another year. Secondly, there would be a security deposit of one month's rent due upon signing of the lease agreement. Lastly, the rent would be paid monthly in advance. What are your thoughts on these conditions?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month, with the lease term of one year and the security deposit of one month's rent.
TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Max. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price and conditions. I will prepare the lease agreement for you to review and sign, and we can proceed with the move-in process. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me.
name: Heinrich Heine
